Well-equipped modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, designed following Vastu guidelines to maintain positive energy.

Secondary bedroom designed with Vastu considerations ensuring calm and balanced energy flow.
Third bedroom for joint family members, featuring classic Art Deco accents and Vastu-aligned placement.
Well-planned bathroom with thoughtful layout to maintain privacy and adhere to building norms.
